reviews.text:
Really Top experience.
Staff very friendly and attentive.
Dishes fresh, good quality of products, you have two option to choose size the main dishes. Smaller and a litte cheaper are nice if you are not very hungry and you take before some soup or you planned take same dessert.
If you are hungry big portion are really good and fair price for the service and quality in this country :) The best risotto ever.
Very beautiful decorated. It's not very touristic restaurant so it's possible find some table if you are lucky without make reservation , in the time when we stay most of people stay in business lunch. But definitely it's very good experience and we hope come back in next year.
High recommend!
Lovely restaurant with delicious food and wonderful service! Gnocchi was home made!

It's a very good lunch place and one of the few high-end business lunch establishments in Vaduz. My regular place to go for a business lunch.

It's a rather conservative place and might not cater to tourists but if you're in a suit and speak German, the service is outstanding!

Mediocre food, very inattentive staff. Had to wait to be seated in a nearly empty restaurant. The waiters were very rude towards us, maybe because we are tourists but we had a large order with wine. They were bias towards us, other guests were treated more politely. Empty plates were taken only after 15 minutes even though the waiters noticed them. We were asked if everything was OK but when we said not really, the waiters did not follow up to ask us what we did not like, instead they talked about us to each other and looked at us unpleasantly. This is unacceptable in a restaurant of a higher than average class.

A nice place. We didn't eat, but the refreshments were of good quality. The place was open late and the service was friendly and good. They accepted Euro and, most importantly, did not try gilting us with the outrageous 1to1 Euro/Frank exchange, which is such a norm in Switzerland and Lichtenstein.
